meanings.definition: The quality or state of being glaring or shining brightly.
meanings.sent1: The glariness of the sun hurt my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The glariness of the polished metal caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The glariness of the disco ball made the party feel like a dance under the stars.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a glariness that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The glariness of the neon sign made it impossible to miss the store.

meanings.definition: The act of glaring or staring fiercely.
meanings.sent1: His glariness made me feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's glariness silenced the noisy classroom.
meanings.sent3: The cat's glariness at the mouse was both intimidating and comical.
meanings.sent4: She faced the challenge with a glariness that showed her determination.
meanings.sent5: The glariness of the security guard made shoplifters think twice.

meanings.sent1: The glariness of the headlights blinded the driver momentarily.
meanings.sent2: The glariness of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The glariness of the camera flash made everyone squint.
meanings.sent4: The glariness of the stage lights added to the drama of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The glariness of the diamond ring caught her eye from across the room.
